00141   void addDiscordantCluster(DiscordantCluster dc) { m_dc.push_back(dc); } 
00142 
00146   std::string printDiscordantClusters() const;
00147 
00149   std::string getContigName() const { assert(m_align.size()); return m_align[0].align.Name; }
00150 
00154   int getMaxMapq() const { 
00155     int m = -1;
00156     for (auto& i : m_align)
00157       if (i.align.MapQuality > m)
00158         m = i.align.MapQuality;
00159     return m;
00160   }
00161 
00165   int getMinMapq() const { 
00166     int m = 1000;
00167     for (auto& i : m_align)
00168       if (i.align.MapQuality < m)
00169         m = i.align.MapQuality;
00170     return m;
00171   }
00172 
00177   void splitCoverage();
00178   
00183   void blacklist(GRC& grv);
00184

00200   void setMultiMapBreakPairs();

00207   void alignReadsToContigs(ReadVec &bav);

00210   std::string getSequence() const { assert(m_seq.length()); return m_seq; }
00211 
00213   bool hasSubSequence(const std::string& subseq) const { 
00214     return (m_seq.find(subseq) != std::string::npos);
00215   }
00216

00253 struct PlottedRead {
00254 
00255   int pos;
00256   std::string seq;
00257   std::string info;
00258 
00259   bool operator<(const PlottedRead& pr) const {
00260     return (pos < pr.pos);
00261   }
00262 
00263 };
00264 
00265 typedef std::vector<PlottedRead> PlottedReadVector;
00266 
00267 struct PlottedReadLine {
00268 
00269   std::vector<PlottedRead*> read_vec;
00270   int available = 0;
00271   int contig_len = 0;
00272 
00273   void addRead(PlottedRead *r) {
00274     read_vec.push_back(r);
00275     available = r->pos + r->seq.length() + 5;
00276   }
00277 
00278   bool readFits(PlottedRead &r) {
00279     return (r.pos >= available);
00280   }
00281 
00282   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const PlottedReadLine &r) {
00283     int last_loc = 0;
00284     for (auto& i : r.read_vec) {
00285       assert(i->pos - last_loc >= 0);
00286       out << std::string(i->pos - last_loc, ' ') << i->seq;
00287       last_loc = i->pos + i->seq.length();
00288     }
00289     int name_buff = r.contig_len - last_loc;
00290     assert(name_buff < 10000);
00291     out << std::string(max(name_buff, 5), ' ');
00292     for (auto& i : r.read_vec) { // add the data
00293       out << i->info << ",";
00294     }
00295     return out;
00296   }
00297 
00298 };
00299 
00300 typedef std::vector<PlottedReadLine> PlottedReadLineVector;
